transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan madam, mujhe hai na Pune mein, mosquitonet wholesaler ko hai kya Pune mein?
Executive: Aapke company se, sir aap konsi company se baat kar rahe hain?
Customer: Ansh carpet.
Executive: Ji bataye.
Customer: Mujhe na Pune mein jo Arkage company hai na Arkage.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Haan, unka number chahiye tha, mosquitonet banate hai na wo.
Executive: Okay, sir, ek minute.
Executive: Sir aap mere ko ek minute ka time dijiye, main check karke call back kar dunga aapko, theek hai? 
Customer: Haan, Pune mein Arkage karke hai, mosquitonet banate, unka number chahiye.
Executive: Theek hai sir, ek minute.
summary:
Concerns:

- Needs contact number of Arkage company in Pune.

- Arkage manufactures mosquito nets.



Resolution:

- Executive asked for a minute to check.

- Executive will call back after checking.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- contact details, mosquito net, wholesaler
